TextView.android:text:
We value your privacy and ensure your data is securely stored and never shared without your consent.
 
 • We collect only basic profile and pet information (name, age, gender, breed, etc.) to personalize your app experience.
 
 • Your email is used only for account authentication and communication — we never share it with third parties.
 
 • Posts, comments, likes, and reminders are stored securely and shown only where applicable (e.g., public posts or private calendar events).
 
 • Your pet's medical info, appointments, and reminders are private and only accessible by you.
 
 • We do not use your personal data for advertising or commercial purposes.
 
 • Profile and pet images are stored in Firestore for display within the app. You may change or remove them anytime.
 
 • All passwords are encrypted through Firebase Authentication. We cannot access them.
 
 • You have full control: you can update or delete your profile, pet info, or posts at any time.
 
 • Only your username and avatar are visible to other users in posts or comments.
 
 • Location-based services (like finding clinics nearby) require permission and are used only when needed — not tracked in the background.
 
 • We perform periodic audits to ensure data is handled securely and ethically.
 
 • For any questions, corrections, or data deletion requests, email us at: pettoo2025@gmail.com
